webforest 0.2.1

Set marker colors for multi-effect plots

Source: R/classes-theme.R
set_marker_colors.Rd

Convenience function to set theme marker colors for multi-effect forest plots. Effects without an explicit color will use these colors in order.

set_marker_colors(theme, colors)

Arguments

theme

A WebTheme object

colors

Character vector of colors for effects (e.g., c("#2563eb", "#dc2626"))

Value

Modified WebTheme object

Examples

web_theme_default() |>
  set_marker_colors(c("#0891b2", "#dc2626", "#16a34a"))
#> <webforest::WebTheme>
